'''Stephen Walsh''' is an English fantasy artist. In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create art for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.stephenwalshillustrations.com/about|articlename=About|website=Artist's website}}</ref>
